sentences.sContent: The pipeline processes documents before they are indexed in the full-text index, and it provides automated summarization, document format conversion, and categorization services (See Figure 1).
sentences.sContent_eng: The pipeline processes documents before they are indexed in the full-text index, and it provides automated summarization, document format conversion, and categorization services (See Figure 1).
sentences.sCn: 在全文索引中建立文档的索引之前，管道将对文档进行处理，并且提供了自动化的摘要、文档格式转换和分类服务（请参见图 1）。
